spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement is mostly correct. Wall alignment shows minor inaccuracies especially around the bathroom and Hall. Door and window placements have several discrepancies.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness appears consistent. Door embeddings are incorrect in several instances. Missing rooms are significant (most closets). Hallucinated elements are present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is generally accurate, but scale consistency is not perfectly maintained. Some furniture pieces are simplified or missing.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness is good. Orthographic projection is reasonable. Lighting quality is basic. Geometry is clean. Visual clarity is good.

detected_errors.description: Missing toilet in Bedroom 2 bathroom (appears to be a smaller secondary bed/bath area not fully rendered or inaccurate on floorplan).
Misplaced door to Laundry room (swings outward instead of inward).
Misplaced entry door (opens inward, but floorplan suggests out or pocket).
Misplaced windows in Laundry and Bathroom zones (different sizes/positions).
Misplaced windows in Living Room (size and number mismatch).
Misplaced window in Kitchen/Dining area (missing a larger window on the wall).
Orientation error for several doors regarding swing direction and pivot point.
Hallucinated small bed in Bedroom 2 where a desk or closet should be per the floor plan layout's intent.
Hallucinated second toilet/sink setup in Bedroom 2 closet area.
Proportion distortion of Laundry room and Bathroom, appearing slightly narrower.
Kitchen/Dining area window proportions are distorted; actual window is larger than represented in 3D.
